Row.Text: Repair the damage to the outer defenses of this city. Only possible if this city has not been attacked for at least 3 turns.
District-based project which provides [ICON_Gold] Gold every turn and [ICON_GreatGeneral] Great General points once finished.
District-based project which provides [ICON_Gold] Gold every turn and [ICON_GreatAdmiral] Great Admiral points once finished.
District-based project which provides [ICON_Gold] Gold every turn and [ICON_GreatEngineer] Great Engineer points once finished.
District-based project which provides a large amount of [ICON_Gold] Gold every turn and [ICON_GreatMerchant] Great Merchant points once finished.
District-based project which provides [ICON_Faith] Faith every turn and [ICON_GreatProphet] Great Prophet points once finished.
District-based project which provides [ICON_Science] Science every turn and [ICON_GreatScientist] Great Scientist points once finished.

District-based project which provides [ICON_Culture] Culture every turn and a small amount of [ICON_GreatWriter] Great Writer, [ICON_GreatArtist] Great Artist, and [ICON_GreatMusician] Great Musician points once finished.

Brazilian unique project which provides +1 [ICON_Amenities] Amenity when active and [ICON_GreatPerson] Great Person Points for [ICON_GreatEngineer] Great Engineers, [ICON_GreatMerchant] Great Merchants, [ICON_GreatWriter] Great Writers, [ICON_GreatArtist] Great Artists, and [ICON_GreatMusician] Great Musicians once finished.
Space Race project which launches a small satellite into orbit. Reveals the geography of any unexplored corner of the world, and marks the first step towards the Science Victory.

Space Race project which launches a large rocket to land a human on the moon. Grants a one time [ICON_Culture] Culture bonus equal to 10 times your [ICON_Science] Science per turn, and marks the second step towards the Science Victory.
Space Race project which launches a Reactor module into orbit for the Mars Colony mission. Launching all three modules wins the Science Victory.
Space Race project which launches a Habitation module into orbit for the Mars Colony mission. Launching all three modules wins the Science Victory.
Space Race project which launches a Hydroponics module into orbit for the Mars Colony mission. Launching all three modules wins the Science Victory.
Allows for the creation of Nuclear Devices.
Allows for the creation of Thermonuclear Devices.
Adds one Nuclear Device to your nation's inventory. Requires [ICON_Resource_Uranium] Uranium. Maintenance is 14 [ICON_Gold] Gold.
Adds a Thermonuclear Device to your nation's inventory. Requires [ICON_Resource_Uranium] Uranium. Maintenance is 16 [ICON_Gold] Gold.
You've successfully launched a satellite into orbit! Reveals the geography of any unexplored corner of the world, and marks the first step towards the Science Victory.

You successfully land a person on the moon! Grants a one time [ICON_Culture] Culture bonus equal to 10 times your [ICON_Science] Science per turn, and marks the second step towards the Science Victory.
You successfully launch a Reactor module, a key component in your Mars Colony spacecraft. Launching all three modules into orbit completes the spacecraft, and wins the Science Victory.
You successfully launch a Habitation module, a key component in your Mars Colony spacecraft. Launching all three modules into orbit completes the spacecraft, and wins the Science Victory.
You successfully launch a Hydroponics module, a key component in your Mars Colony spacecraft. Launching all three modules into orbit completes the spacecraft, and wins the Science Victory.
